description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement on behalf of Transport Canada for the restoration of the runway, taxiway, apron, roads and parking area at the St. Anthony Airport, NL. The work under this project consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material to perform the work. Delivery date: work will be completed in stages over the next 3 years. Bid Security is a requirement for this tender. The estimated value for this opportunity is in the range of $5,000,001 to $20,000,000. This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
